update daily_report
SHIFT_DATE = #{shiftDate,jdbcType=DATE},
SHIFT = #{shift,jdbcType=BIGINT},
SHOP = #{shop,jdbcType=BIGINT},
QUESTION_TITLE = #{questionTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUESTION_TYPE = #{questionType,jdbcType=BIGINT},
QUESTION_USER = #{questionUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUESTION_CONTACT = #{questionContact,jdbcType=BIGINT},
QUESTION_PHONE = #{questionPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUESTION_DETAIL = #{questionDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUESTION_STATE = #{questionState,jdbcType=BIGINT},
QUESTION_REASON = #{questionReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECEIVE_TIME = #{receiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RECEIVE_USER = #{receiveUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

CREATE_USER_ID = #{createUserId,jdbcType=CHAR},

where REPORT_ID = #{reportId,jdbcType=CHAR}
